comments.body: I find this odd that the types of choice consumption does not include nonconsuming above - so omit the new section header.
Well, all the ones above are variations on consuming choices. But I take your point

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +68,72 @@A `choice <#choice>`__ marked **postconsuming** will not be `archived <#active-contract-archived-contract>`__ until the end of the `exercise <#exercise>`__ choice body.
